directions: Combine tomatoes and juice in large bowl. Add corn, green onions, bell pepper, 2 tablespoons basil and garlic and blend well. Season to taste with hot pepper sauce, salt and pepper. Chill at least 15 minutes and up to 2 hours.
Ladle soup into four bowls, dividing evenly. Garnish with yogurt and chopped basil and serve.
ingredients: 2 cups chopped ripe plum tomatoes (about 14 ounces)
2 tablespoons finely shredded fresh basil or 1 teaspoon dried, crumbled
title: Fresh Tomato Corn Soup
